patterns: i want to create a heading?
how can i create a heading?
responses:
HTML headings are defined with the < h1 > to < h6 > tags.
< h1 > defines the most important heading. < h6 > defines the least important heading.

patterns: i want to create a title
how can i create a title?
responses: The title must be text-only, and it is shown in the browser's title bar or in the page's tab. The < title > tag is required in HTML documents!
